description:
shit's borked
can't register an account w/o captcha
You can't make an account without filling out a Captcha, and it doesn't work.

Below is the error message when I run any game

ssf2xjr1 was not found.
ssf2t was not found.

The following ROMs are invalid:
 • essential program ROM sfxj.03c was not found.
 • essential program ROM sfxj.04a was not found.
 • essential program ROM sfxj.05 was not found.
 • essential program ROM sfxj.06a was not found.
 • essential program ROM sfxj.07 was not found.
 • essential program ROM sfxj.08 was not found.
 • essential program ROM sfx.09 was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.13m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.15m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.17m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.19m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.14m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.16m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.18m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.20m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.21m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.23m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.25m was not found.
 • graphics ROM sfx.27m was not found.
 • essential program ROM sfx.01 was not found.
 • essential program ROM sfx.02 was not found.
 • sound ROM sfx.11m was not found.
 • sound ROM sfx.12m was not found.
 • ROM ssf2xj.key was not found.

No data was found, the game will not run!
You only need to install the roms
It is confusing at the begining, but if you read on reddit you will understaaaaaand
It really works but use directdraw or otherwise you get black and white stuff.
super easy to use and play

Fightcade 2 works lovely on my Steam Deck. This is a nice and clean install. Not to mention Its very organized and easy to use. Flycast, FBneo, and the other emulators are all working for me. Ive been playing MvC2, Power Stone, Street Fighter Alpha 3 and other random stuff with friends. Every aspect of this app thay Ive used seems to be working as intented.

My recommendations would be for anyone who downloads this. Is to also get the compainion program "Wine" it helps Fightcate run things better. Youll see the program pop up when you type in Fightcade in the Discover store. Secondly, get the most recent Json file for Fightcade. You can google for it. Once you add it, whenever you enter a lobby on Fightcade it will auto download the correct rom for you immediately and place it in the correct directory in the roms folder. You dont have to do anything. It makes Fightcade so mich more convient and premium feeling. As of writing this the most recent Json file is from April 2023. This is a must! No more trying rom after rom. Its just plug n play. Lastly, if you want to play sone of the supported Atomiswave games in the Flycast emulator. Such as Metal Slug 6 or Dolphin Blue for example. You do have to find the Atomiswave bios. i recoomend getting this just so every aspect of Fightcade is available to you. Nice and complete. the Json file will find all those roms for you as well.

The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars out of 5. Is becausse the flatpak version has a issue with creating a new account. When you try to create a new account like I needed to join the community. it will keep saying something about cant connect to the recaptcha and wont complete the account creation process. To get around this I had to download the standard Limux version off the Fightcade website. Then, open the client of that version and create a account. it works fine in that client. After creating my accoiunt that way, I deleted the standard version and successfully logged into this version of Fightcade on my Steam Deck. The accoint creation issue really needs to be addressed and fixed. Other than thay it has been smooth sailing.

I'm really enjoying Fightcade. I'm not sure why the reviews are so low. it definitely is working correctly. Hope this helps somebody! See you on Fightcade! Shoooryuuuken!
summary: Works Wobderfully on my Steam Deck!

description: Does not work. You cant register.
no poder iniciar el emulador por pedirte un registro y no te deja registrar por no generar captcha

la aplicación funciona bien, el inconveniente es el rom pack, tienen que descargarse uno que tenga todas las bios (incluidos uni-bios_3_3; uni-bios_4_0.) lo comprimen e insertan en donde estan las rooms y no tendran problemas para correr juegos de peleas

La versión Flatpak funciona, digo, instala todo, puedes iniciar sesiòn e incluye WINE, todo en el mismo paquete. El problema es que el navegador interno de carpetas para poder escoger la dirección de las ROMs no detecta otras particiones, de hecho, no se siquiera donde poder guardar las ROMs que siempre me han funcionado en la instalación por si sola. Mientras descubro cómo.. se queda con 4 estrellas

The Flatpak version works, I mean it can install everything, you can log in and it includes WINE, all in the same package. The problem is that the internal folder browser to be able to choose the address of the ROMs does not detect other partitions, in fact, I don't even know where to move the ROMs that have always worked for me in the installation by itself.

Esta versión Flatpak ha mejorado en todo aquello que lo diferenciaba de su forma original. Modo entrenamiento funciona perfecto, guardar Roms no es un problema, configuración de mandos, input lag va bien, conexión va bien y otras características especiales que utilizarían streamers, todo bien.

Totalmente recomendable la versión Flatpak, y muy útil su comunidad en Discord.
